select shd.ht_dept_id, shd.dept_id,shd.dept_code, shd.dept_name, shd.dept_desc, shd.factory_id, shd.status, shd.create_user_id, u.user_name as createUserName,shd.create_time,shd.modified_user_id, s.user_name as modifiedUserName, shd.modified_time from fantech_imes.smt_ht_dept shd left join ocean.sys_user u on shd.create_user_id=u.user_id left join ocean.sys_user s on shd.modified_user_id=s.user_id
1=1
and date_format(shd.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
and shd.dept_code like CONCAT('%', #{deptCode}, '%')
and shd.dept_name like CONCAT('%', #{deptName}, '%')
and shd.dept_desc like CONCAT('%', #{deptDesc}, '%')
